A class expansion pack for Rimworld of Magic， Added an ancient and unique class「Mana Devourer」 A class that can devour a mage and absorb his power. It can also give others the power to transform he into「Apostle」. However, this class is now extinct. A new Scenario Ancient ruins Remains of ancient Devourer many new abilities two accessory class of Devourer
